backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping project requirements to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high-level summaries for all frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, fonts, and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app router defining routes for all five pages using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Reusable Section and SectionHeader components for consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with salon details, contact info, booking link, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, branding, and call button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for potential data queries; contains no logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for a warm luxury palette used across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with salon details, location, expertise highlights, and commitment sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, hours, booking links, and full address with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of salon images with a selectable lightbox modal for enlarged viewing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero banner, booking actions, and highlighted service categories.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists detailed hair, skin, and nail services with featured sections and styled service categories.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system using CSS variables, extended fonts, shadows, and animations, plus plugin integration.
project_state.json: Defines project state, features, and image requirements for building a 5â€‘page luxury salon website.
